医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究显示，口服索马鲁肽在改善糖尿病控制和心血管健康方面显示出巨大的前景《临床医学杂志》最近的一项研究发现，口服索马鲁肽治疗 24 周后可显着改善 2 型糖尿病患者的血糖控制并减轻体重。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Oral-semaglutide-shows-significant-promise-in-improving-diabetes-control-and-cardioangio-health-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Oral-semaglutide-shows-significant-promise-in-improving-diabetes-control-and-cardioangio-health-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=332902e2-44b5-4095-83dc-1e1814b4912c Wed, 29 May 2024 21:05:00 -0400 Oral semaglutide shows significant promise in improving diabetes control and cardiovascular health, study reveals
研究人员推翻了结直肠肿瘤发生的流行理论威尔康奈尔医学领导的研究提供了新的证据，表明大多数结直肠癌始于肠道干细胞的丧失，甚至在致癌基因改变出现之前。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Researchers-overturn-the-prevailing-theory-for-colorectal-tumor-initiation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Researchers-overturn-the-prevailing-theory-for-colorectal-tumor-initiation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=50d42e84-250d-4856-a499-03544102ede9 Wed, 29 May 2024 15:24:03 -0400 Researchers overturn the prevailing theory for colorectal tumor initiation
研究发现心力衰竭住院后出现肾脏并发症在一项针对医疗保险受益人的研究中，布莱根妇女医院的研究人员发现，因心力衰竭住院一年后，6% 的患者已进行透析。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Study-finds-kidney-complications-following-heart-failure-hospitalization.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Study-finds-kidney-complications-following-heart-failure-hospitalization.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2867b989-14a9-4a75-9ad7-5d4e3847befb Wed, 29 May 2024 15:17:51 -0400 Study finds kidney complications following heart failure hospitalization

研究揭示高温暴露与肥胖中的鞘脂代谢之间的新联系在当代社会，肥胖已成为一种世界范围的慢性代谢紊乱，给个人健康和医疗保健系统带来沉重负担。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Study-reveals-new-link- Between-high-temposure-and-sphingolipid-metabolism-in-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Study-reveals-new-link- Between-high-temporary-exposure-and-sphingolipid-metabolism-in-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f07a18e2-45cf-45dc-bf50-65b2831a1f21 Wed, 29 May 2024 14:49:19 -0400 Study reveals new link between high temperature exposure and sphingolipid metabolism in obesity

研究表明，心脏健康的行为可能会减缓生物衰老根据今天发表在《美国心脏协会杂志》上的一项开放获取的新研究，更好的心脏健康的好处可能与心脏健康的生活方式因素对生物衰老（身体及其细胞的年龄）的积极影响有关。 ，美国心脏协会的同行评审期刊。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Heart-healthy-behaviors-may-slow-biological-aging-research-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Heart-healthy-behaviors-may-slow-biological-aging-research-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=65263818-7bc2-41d1-8d07-14c4d6ffa629 Wed, 29 May 2024 07:41:00 -0400 Heart healthy behaviors may slow biological aging, research shows
